msbt.message: Thank you for all of those letters, and for all of the feverish feelings crammed into each of them. Plus gifts?! You're too much. I can't possibly make it up to you, but at least I'll give it a try.

I finally finished reading all of those letters you sent me. Wow! And those gifts... You're really something else. I tried to pick out the perfect thank-you gift for you, so I hope you really like it.

Wow! You really put all kinds of feelings out there when you sent me all those letters. I love it! Not to mention the lovely gifts... Well, I can't quite match your generosity, but hopefully you appreciate this...
My mailbox was overflowing with all the fan letters you sent me! I wish I had time to write a response to each and every one, but, well... This one reply is gonna have to do the trick.
I gotta say, all of the letters you wrote me really took my breath away. It's super sweet of you to spend so much time thinking of me, and only a little sad!
There I was, about to open my mailbox, expecting maybe one or two letters. Then...BOOM! You happened! There were...no words. I guess you had all of 'em. Anyway, thanks!
